meta.name: description
meta.content: ObjectLab Kit offers free and open source Date calculators, released under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 license.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Date calculator, IMM Dates, Period Calculator, Financial Calendar, Business Calendar, java, open source

section.name: Utils Excel Introduction
section.p: Small package to help with Excel spreadsheet manipulation via Apache POI.

section.name: Examples
section.subsection: Similar usage for Triplet and Quadruplet (but you would probably better model those as proper domain classes).
